arts.ttl: Spain boss comments on Barcelona forward’s chances of playing vs Turkey – ‘He is training very well’
arts.sum: After a 3-0 win over Bulgaria, Spain are gearing up for a tougher challenge tomorrow evening as they take on Turkey. Barcelona superstar Lamine Yamal suffered an injury scare in the first game, but it was later revealed to be minor discomfort.
